info.description: User management system with LDAP server support.
info.title: Claude Demo API

post.description: Authenticate with username and password, returns JWT token
Stateless logout (JWT is not invalidated server-side)
Create a new user group, optionally with a parent group

get.description: Retrieve a group by ID with children
Return all users in a group

delete.description: Remove a user from a group

get.description: Return the current LDAP server configuration

put.description: Update the LDAP server configuration (base_dn, mode, port)

get.description: Return the LDAP server running status
List users with pagination and optional search

parameters.description: Search by username, display_name, or email
parameters.name: search

post.description: Create a new user (no authentication required)

get.description: Return all groups a user belongs to

put.description: Change a user's password (requires old password verification)
Enable or disable a user account
